This application is develloped with love and great care by Wouter Legiest and Pelle Reyniers. The inspiration for this application can be found in many frustrating moments. Beside the frustrating moments was there the interest in third party apis that contain a lot of usefull data. The actual goal of this goes much further than what we achieved in this project: we believe it is possible to scrape the api in a search for trains with a delay greater than 30 mins. If you have a train subscription, it can be possible to search for late trains and let the application file a complaint.
